Gdyby nie decyzje sprzed kilkudziesięciu lat, związki Grenlandii z naszym kontynentem mogłyby być znacznie bliższe, a zakusy USA uderzałyby wtedy bezpośrednio w integralność UE.

articles.title: Powtórka z 1999 roku? Niedzielewski: Czekają nas wzrosty, ale i większa nerwowość na giełdach
articles.summary: Entuzjazm wokół inwestycji w sztuczną inteligencję może jeszcze potrwać, a nawet się nasilić. Obawy o przeinwestowanie wydają się przedwczesne - uważa Jarosław Niedzielewski z

articles.title: Gra o Grenlandię. Premier: Chcemy NATO, Danię i UE. Trump grozi "trudniejszym sposobem"
articles.summary: Wiceprezydent Stanów Zjednoczonych J.D. Vance weźmie udział w zaplanowanych na środę rozmowach władz Danii i Grenlandii z amerykańskim sekretarzem stanu Markiem Rubio – poinformo

articles.title: Delta CEO sees record earnings in reach again thanks to high-end travel demand
articles.summary: The airline said bookings are strong from both leisure customers and corporate travelers in the first few days of the year.

articles.title: Trump kontra Powell. Konsekwencje tego konfliktu będą globalne [OPINIA]
articles.summary: Konflikt prezydenta USA z szefem Fed wszedł w fazę instytucjonalną. Jeśli Fed przestanie być postrzegany jako instytucja odporna na naciski polityczne, ucierpi wiarygodność dolara, wzrośnie zmienność na rynkach walutowych i długu, a koszt kapitału podniesie się globalnie

articles.title: Boeing's airplane deliveries are the highest in 7 years. Now it's about to pick up the pace
articles.summary: Boeing is set to outline its production increase plans later this month after it's expected to post its best year for deliveries since 2018.

articles.title: Inside GM's new world headquarters: Modernized midcentury designs with artifacts, surprises from the American icon
articles.summary: GM has filled its new Detroit headquarters with artifacts, design nods and "Easter eggs" tied to the Detroit automaker's history.

articles.title: 2026 is the year of obesity pills. Here's how they could reshape the GLP-1 market
articles.summary: Patients can already access the first GLP-1 obesity pill from Novo Nordisk, and a rival oral drug from Eli Lilly is slated for U.S. approval later this year.

articles.title: Gen Z and social media are helping men’s makeup go mainstream. The beauty industry is trying to capitalize
articles.summary: Men’s makeup is shedding stigma as TikTok and Gen Z drives growth, retailers rethink displays and brands chase one of beauty’s last untapped markets.

articles.title: JPMorgan's looming question: What happens when CEO Jamie Dimon leaves?
articles.summary: JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon marks 20 years as CEO this month. Insiders say he remains as involved as ever managing the sprawling operations of the megabank.

articles.title: Jersey Mike's strikes European expansion deal led by founder Peter Cancro
articles.summary: Jersey Mike's plans to open 400 stores in the U.K. and Ireland, with more locations to follow in Europe.

articles.title: Trump's credit card rate cap plan has unclear path, 'devastating' risks, bank insiders say
articles.summary: A 10% rate cap would make large swaths of the credit card industry unprofitable, especially tied to customers with less-than-ideal credit, banks say.

articles.title: Allegiant to buy rival budget airline Sun Country in $1.5 billion cash and stock deal
articles.summary: Budget airlines in the U.S. like Allegiant and Sun Country have faced a surge in costs following the pandemic and the increase in domestic capacity.

articles.title: Ho-hum holiday: Retail's early results show modest growth in critical shopping season
articles.summary: The 2025 holiday season was solid for some retailers as they posted modest growth, but results failed to blow away expectations.

articles.title: Discount grocer Aldi plans to open more than 180 stores in U.S. this year as customers across incomes seek value
articles.summary: Aldi's growth reflects the fiercer competition with traditional players as discounters lure away shoppers and win more of their weekly grocery runs.

articles.title: How IMAX crushed other theater stocks in 2025
articles.summary: IMAX outperformed other theatrical stocks in 2025 as it capitalized on changing consumer trends and partnerships with major studio productions.

articles.title: Stellantis scraps Jeep, Chrysler plug-in hybrid vehicles amid EV slowdown, recall
articles.summary: The decision is an about-face for the automaker, which has touted its sales leadership of the models, known as PHEVs, for years.

articles.title: Amazon Pharmacy starts offering Novo Nordisk's Wegovy weight loss pill
articles.summary: Eligible customers with insurance can pay as little as $25 for a one-month supply of the drug, while cash-paying options start at $149 a month, Amazon said.
